instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..
definitions.820-01700: What is 820-01700? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (MBP <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 16" 2019) Corrosion Near SSD, stuck at 5v even after cleanup
threads.message:
Hi,

Initial readings on Amp meter: 5.085V, 0.026A
- 3 resistors and 1 cap near SSD (<CHIP>U9100</CHIP>) were damaged. Replaced, still, the readings are the same.
- <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>
Diode mode - 0.044
Resistance -25 Ohm

No other visible damage. What shall I do next?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (MBP <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 16" 2019) Corrosion Near SSD, stuck at 5v even after cleanup
threads.message:
"What shall I do next?"
Stop using "register" instead of "resistor".

Compare the readings on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> with L9581/82.
I suppose <CHIP>U9580</CHIP> is shorted and SSD is damaged.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (MBP <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 16" 2019) Corrosion Near SSD, stuck at 5v even after cleanup
threads.message:
Okay, boss... resistor it is now

Compare the reading???

threads.message:

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (MBP <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 16" 2019) Corrosion Near SSD, stuck at 5v even after cleanup
threads.message:
Check if any coil on the board gets similar readings with <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>.
Should be a coil from a secondary power supply connected to <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>.
